record.description: [Decorated for Amos A. Stagg's National Interscholastic Track and Field Meet which was held from] 1902 to 1932. Dr. David Strans [presented the photograph to the library].
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Back reads (in Stagg's handwriting) "University of Chicago Interscholastic Track and Field Meet 1902-1932."Attached to cardboard back. Two prints are glued onto the same cardboard base.
